events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and our team will review your credentials shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills.
A recruiter specializing in software development roles has been assigned to assist you throughout the hiring process.
The initial screening call has been scheduled to discuss your background and interest in the engineering role.
The candidate has responded promptly and confirmed their availability for the initial screening interview.
A technical interview has been scheduled to assess your programming and problem-solving skills.
The technical interview was completed successfully, with the candidate demonstrating strong software development capabilities.
The HR interview has been arranged to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and company policies with the candidate.
The HR interview concluded positively, with the candidate showing enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
An official job offer for the Software Engineer position has been sent to the candidate including salary and benefits details.
The candidate has responded with positive feedback, expressing eagerness to review and accept the offer.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer and is looking forward to joining the engineering team.
The onboarding process has started, including equipment provisioning and introductory meetings within the engineering department.
The hiring process is now officially closed with the candidate successfully onboarded as a Software Engineer.
